comment: Yep, It's quite important to have a bit of common sense. Shame that common sense ain't so common any more, might need to change it to rare sense or "really hard to find sense". People need to be aware that you can still freeze to death in civilized lands, if you are a retard and don't wear appropriate attire.
amr:
